original_text: There was a gate to the inner court facing the north gate, just as there was on the east. He measured from one gate to the opposite one; it was a hundred cubits.
korean_text: 안뜰에도 북쪽 문간과 동쪽 문간과 마주 대한 문간들이 있는데 그가 이 문간에서 맞은쪽 문간까지 측량하니 백 척이더라

sentences.original_text: There was a gate to the inner court
just as there was on the east
He measured from one gate to the opposite one
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 한 문에서 반대편 문까지 측정했다
